trans-unit.source: Base class for entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the key for this object.
Object Services uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> property to manage objects in the object context.
You cannot set the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.EntityKey%2A> property after an object is attached to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
The <xref href="System.Data.EntityKey"></xref> for this object.
Gets the entity state of the object.

When an object is attached to the object context, either as the result of a query or by calling <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Attach%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.EntityState> becomes <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Unchanged>.
When an object is detached from the object context, it returns to the <xref:System.Data.EntityState.Detached> state.
The <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> of this object.
Notifies the change tracker that a property has changed.

When an entity type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanged%2A> method is called after a property change to commit the cached value in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> as the original value of the property.
This method calls the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanged%2A> method in the change tracker.
The name of the changed property.
property is `null`.
Notifies the change tracker that a property change is pending.

When an entity type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.ReportPropertyChanging%2A> method is called before a property change to cache the current value of the property in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> so that this value can be used as the original value for the property.
This method calls the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker.EntityMemberChanging%2A> method in the change tracker.
The name of the changing property.
property is `null`.
Specifies the instance of <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker"></xref> that is used to report property changes.
This method is called by Object Services to specify the instance of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityChangeTracker> for the object to use to track changes.
This is typically called when the entity is added to or removed from an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>.
Reference to the change tracker that is used to report property changes.
Gets the relationship manager used by this object.

<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityObject.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IEntityWithRelationships%23RelationshipManager%2A> returns a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> used by this object.
Object Services uses the relationship manager to provide access to related objects.
Classes that expose relationships must implement this property by constructing and setting <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> in their constructor.

The implementation of this property should use the static method <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager.Create%2A> to create a new <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager> when needed.
After being created, it is expected that this object will be stored on the entity and will be provided through this property.
The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> used by this object.
